languages.text: "Никак праведников искал для кровавого ритуала? Надо возблагодарить Императора, что не указал ни на кого знамением в этот день..."

traits.locale_text: "Никак праведников искал для кровавого ритуала? Надо возблагодарить Императора, что не указал ни на кого знамением в тот день..."

languages.text: "Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not sending a portent to mark someone on this particular day..."
languages.original_text: "Никак праведников искал для кровавого ритуала? Надо возблагодарить Императора, что не указал ни на кого знамением в этот день..."

traits.locale_text: "Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not marking anyone through a portent on this day..."
"Don't get too excited. What if the weaver had decided it was your time to go? We wouldn't be talking now..."
"Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not sending a portent to mark someone on this particular day..."
"I don't know why you're so excited. What if the weaver decided it was your time to go? We wouldn't even be having this conversation..."
"Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not sending a portent to mark someone on this particular day..."
"Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not marking anyone through a portent on this day..."
"Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not sending a portent to mark someone on this particular day..."
"Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not sending a portent to mark someone on this particular day..."
"Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not sending a portent to mark someone on this particular day..."

languages.text: « Peut-être qu'il cherchait des âmes vertueuses pour un rituel sanglant ? Grâce soit rendue à l'Empereur pour n'avoir désigné aucune victime en ce jour... »
languages.original_text: "Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not sending a portent to mark someone on this particular day..."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être qu'il cherchait des âmes vertueuses pour un rituel sanglant ? Grâce soit rendue à l'Empereur pour n'avoir désigné aucune victime en ce jour... »
« Je ne sais pas si tu devrais t'en réjouir autant. Et si le tisseur décidait que ton heure était venue ? Tu ne serais pas là pour en parler... »

languages.text: «A lo mejor estaban buscando almas justas para su ritual de sangre. Gracias al Emperador que no han enviado un augurio para que marque a alguien justo hoy...».
languages.original_text: "Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not sending a portent to mark someone on this particular day..."

traits.locale_text: «A lo mejor estaban buscando almas justas para su ritual de sangre. Gracias al Emperador que no han enviado un augurio para que marque a alguien justo hoy...».
«No sé por qué te hace tanta ilusión. ¿Y si el tejedor hubiera decidido que era tu hora? No estaríamos hablando de ello, desde luego...».

languages.text: “说不定他们打算抓走几个好人，用来举行什么血腥的仪式之类的？感谢帝皇没让他们挑这种时候来抓人……”
languages.original_text: "Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not sending a portent to mark someone on this particular day..."

traits.locale_text: “说不定他们打算抓走几个好人，用来举行什么血腥的仪式之类的？感谢帝皇没让他们挑这种时候来抓人……”
“我不明白这有什么好激动的，万一那个织网者觉得该送你走了，那你该怎么办？到时候，你甚至连说这些话的机会都没有……”

languages.text: 「血塗られた儀式のために正義の魂を探していたのでは？この特別な日に誰かを監視するための前兆を送らなかったことに、皇帝に感謝する…」
languages.original_text: "Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not sending a portent to mark someone on this particular day..."

traits.locale_text: 「血塗られた儀式のために正義の魂を探していたのでは？この特別な日に誰かを監視するための前兆を送らなかったことに、皇帝に感謝する…」
「なぜ、そんなに喜んでいるんだ？織り手がお前の人生は終わったと判断したら、どうする？こんなところで会話する事さえ、出来なくなるだろう…」

languages.text: "Hat er womöglich rechtschaffene Seelen für ein blutiges Ritual gesucht? Dem Imperator sei Dank, dass er an diesem besonderen Tag niemanden mit einem Omen auserkoren hat ..."
languages.original_text: "Maybe they were looking for righteous souls for a bloody ritual? Thank the Emperor for not sending a portent to mark someone on this particular day..."

traits.locale_text: "Hat er womöglich rechtschaffene Seelen für ein blutiges Ritual gesucht? Dem Imperator sei Dank, dass er an diesem besonderen Tag niemanden mit einem Omen auserkoren hat ..."
"Ich weiß nicht, warum Ihr so begeistert seid. Was, wenn der Weber entschieden hätte, Eure Zeit sei gekommen? Dann würden wir diese Unterhaltung gar nicht führen ..."
